Verses: 1 yaakkobin Kumaaranaagiya Aagoor Ennum Purushan Eeththiyelukku Vasaniththu, Eeththiyelukkum, Oogaalukkum Uraiththa Ubadhesa Vaakkiyangalaavana:
2 manusharellaarilum Naan Moodan; Manusharukketra Buththi Enakku Illai.
3 naan Gnaanaththaik Karkavum Illai, Parisuththarin Arivai Arindhukollavum Illai.

4 vaanaththukku Eriyiranginavar Yaar? Kaatraith Thamadhu Kaippidigalil Adakkinavar Yaar? Thanneergalai Vasthiraththil Kattinavar Yaar? Boomiyin Ellaigalaiyellaam Sthaabiththavar Yaar? Avarudaiya Naamam Enna? Avar Kumaaranudaiya Naamam Enna? Adhai Arivaayo?
5 dhevanudaiya Vasanamellaam Pudamitappattavaigal; Thammai Andikkollugiravargalukku Avar Kedagamaanavar.
6 avarudaiya Vasanangalodu Ondraiyum Koottaadhe, Koottinaal Avar Unnaik Kadindhukolvaar, Nee Poiyanaavaai.
7 irandu Manu Ummidaththil Ketkiren; Naan Marikkumbariyandhamum Avaigalai Enakku Marukkaamal Thaarum.
8 maayaiyaiyum Poivasanippaiyum Enakkuth Dhoorappaduththum; Thariththiraththaiyum Aisuvariyaththaiyum Enakkuk Kodaadhiruppeeraaga.

9 naan Paripooranam Adaigiradhinaal Marudhaliththu, Karththar Yaar Endru Sollaadhapadikkum; Thariththirappadugiradhinaal Thirudi, En Dhevanudaiya Naamaththai Veenile Vazhangaadhapadikkum, En Padiyai Enakku Alandhu Ennaip Poshiththarulum.
10 ejamaanidaththil Avanudaiya Velaikkaaranmel Kutranchumaththaadhe, Avan Unnai Sabippaan, Nee Kutravaaliyaagak Kaanappaduvaai.
11 thangal Thagappanai Sabiththum, Thangal Thaayai Aaseervadhiyaamalum Irukkira Sandhadhiyaarumundu.
12 thaangal Azhukkarak Kazhuvappadaamalirundhum, Thangal Paarvaikku Suththamaagath Thondrugira Sandhadhiyaarumundu.
13 veroru Sandhadhiyaarumundu; Avargal Kangal Eththanai Mettimaiyum Avargal Imaigal Eththanai Nerippumaanavaigal.
14 dhesaththil Sirumaiyaanavargalaiyum Manusharil Elimaiyaanavargalaiyum Patchippadharkuk Katkangalaiyoththa Parkalaiyum Kaththigalaiyoththa Kadaivaaippargalaiyumudaiya Sandhadhiyaarumundu.
15 thaa, Thaa, Engira Irandu Kumaaraththigal Attaikku Undu. Thrupthiyadaiyaadha Moondrundu, Podhum Endru Sollaadha Naangumundu.
16 avaiyaavana: Paadhaalamum, Malattuk Karppamum, Thanneeraal Thrupthiyadaiyaadha Nilamum, Podhumendru Sollaadha Akkiniyume.
17 thagappanaip Pariyaasampanni, Thaayin Kattalaiyai Asattaipannugira Kannai Nadhiyin Kaagangal Pidungum, Kazhugin Kunjugal Thinnum.
18 enakku Migavum Aachchariyamaanavaigal Moondrundu, En Buththikkettaadhavaigal Naangumundu.
19 avaiyaavana: Aagaayaththil Kazhuginudaiya Vazhiyum, Kanmalaiyinmel Paambinudaiya Vazhiyum, Nadukkadalil Kappalinudaiya Vazhiyum, Oru Kannigaiyai Naadiya Manushanudaiya Vazhiyume.
20 appadiye Vibasaara Sthreeyinudaiya Vazhiyum Irukkiradhu; Aval Thindru, Than Vaayaith Thudaiththu: Naan Oru Paavamum Seyyavillai Enbaal.
21 moondrinimiththam Boomi Sanjalappadugiradhu, Naangaiyum Adhu Thaangamaattaadhu.
22 arasaalugira Adimaiyinimiththamum, Pojanaththaal Thrupthiyaana Moodaninimiththamum,
23 pagaikkappadaththakkavalaayirundhum, Purushanukku Vaazhkkaippatta Sthreeyinimiththamum, Than Naachchiyaarukkup Padhilaaga Illaalaagum Adimaippenninimiththamume.
24 boomiyil Siriyavaigalaayirundhum, Magaa Gnaanamullavaigal Naangundu.
25 avaiyaavana: Arpamaana Jendhuvaayirundhum, Kodaikaalaththile Thangal Aagaaraththai Sambaadhikkira Erumbum,
26 saththuvamatra Jendhuvaayirundhum, Thangal Veettaik Kanmalaiyile Thondivaikkum Kuzhimusalgalum,
27 raajaa Illaadhirundhum, Pavunju Pavunjaaip Purappadugira Vettukkiligalum,
28 than Kaigalinaal Valaiyaip Pinni, Arasar Aramanaigalilirukkira Silandhip Poochchiyume.
29 vinodhamaai Adivaiththu Nadakkiravaigal Moondrundu; Vinodha Nadaiyullavaigal Naalumundu.
30 avaiyaavana: Mirugangalil Savuriyamaanadhum Ondrukkum Pinnidaiyaadhadhumaagiya Singamum,
31 porkkudhiraiyum, Vellaattukkadaavum, Oruvarum Edhirkkak Koodaadha Raajaavume.
32 nee Mettimaiyaanadhinaal Paiththiyamaai Nadandhu, Dhurchsindhanaiyullavanaayirundhaayaanaal, Kaiyinaal Vaayai Moodu.
33 paalaik Kadaidhal Venneyaip Pirappikkum; Mookkaip Pisaidhal Raththaththaip Pirappikkum; Appadiye Kobaththaik Kindividudhal Sandaiyaip Pirappikkum.
